channels-updated: The channel list has been updated successfully.

enable.disabled: All Trick-or-Treat features have been successfully disabled for this server.
enable.enabled: You've successfully enabled all the Trick or Treat features in this server! Don't forget to set the channels to allow creepy monsters to spawn!
enable.no-change: The Trick-or-Treat features were already enabled or disabled in this server.

not-enabled: You can't use this command because this server doesn't have the Trick-or-Treat features enabled.
